snippet: Coach Tom Coughlin and the Giants are trying to figure out how they landed in the same November slump as last year as they look ahead to their most difficult six-game stretch.
abstract: New York Giants, following lopsided loss to Cincinnati Bengals, are finding themselves in yet another November slump as they prepare for their most difficult six-game stretch of the season.
lead_paragraph: Coach Tom Coughlin and the Giants are trying to figure out how they landed in the same November slump as last year as they look ahead to their most difficult six-game stretch.

headline.seo: Giants Approach November Swoon With Hope for Quick Turnaround, Again
headline.main: Giants Approach November Swoon With Hope for Quick Turnaround
headline.print_headline: Giants Approach November Swoon With Hope for Quick Turnaround, Again
